title: Request a Status Match
description: A frequent flyer who has elite status with a competing airline wants to request a status match with this airline.

tasks.description: Explain the status match challenge requirements, such as providing proof of status with the other airline.
Receive the customer's proof of status (e.g., a screenshot of their account).
Verify the documentation and grant the customer a temporary, promotional elite status for a trial period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully grants the temporary status.
